Question
========

Of two independent stochastic variables X and Y is given: var(X) = 9 and var(Y) = 16. Then the standard deviation of X - Y equals to

Answerlist
----------

* -7
* -5
* 5
* 25

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 7: Incorrect
* 5: Incorrect
* 5: Correct
* 25: Incorrect
